title: Comparing the average kda of teammates over multiple accounts
body:
This is an updated post about the previous thread http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-strategy/liHY5B94-apdos-smurf-account-compared-to-others

So I have been doing a bit more data entry into my spreadsheet to get more information on whether or not my theory has holes in it which can disprove it, but I couldn't seem to find any at all...

In fact, it all still lined up perfectly with everything my theory claims so far.

https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1iIK7KBC1wM0qL24zMxIcZ1-hxfHwMtrV7b9ltgbfy9g/edit?usp=sharing

doubleliftfanboy in challenger, is doublelifts account.

Huya90888 is Apdo's account.

All of a sudden, with teams only 0.004% better than average, Apdo only ended up with a 53% win rate.

While my teammates overall have improved on my main to only 11% worse than average and I right now have a 53% win rate

I will do my best to keep this spread sheet updated with the scores of my teammates and the scores of smurf accounts from high elo players to compare the stats.

replies.body: Beautiful detective work as always x
Jesus CHRIST dude. I haven't visited the forums since they closed GD and you're STILL here YEARS later peddling the absurdity that "league is all luck maaaan im stuck low cause of bad teams".
Like everyone claims, statistics dont lie.
